This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Noticed an orb above an arial stunt plane after downloading digital pictures.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking random pictures of stunt planes during an airshow in North Carolina. I then downloaded the digital pictures and noticed an orb directly above the stunt plane. I was unable to see the orb at the time of taking the picture. Frankly I'm not surprised. This isn't the first picture I've taken with orbs in the photos.
